title: qqwx
author: qqwx
created_time: November 16, 2023, 05:20:25 PMLast edit: November 18, 2023, 06:41:25 AM by qqwx
content: INNOVATOR CHAIN (INOV8)INNOVATOR is a pioneering blockchain ecosystem designed to be a secureecosystem for companies and developers seeking to enter the blockchainspace. It offers its users a safe and efficient entry point into the world ofblockchain, empowering them to tap into the benefits of this transformativetechnology.INNOVATOR is not just a blockchain. It's a catalyst for innovation.Developers can leverage funding options to launch their projects on thechain, providing them with an eco-friendly and sustainable solution. Bydoing so, INNOVATOR supports the development of blockchain-basedapplications and services, making it an ideal platform for developers to bringtheir ideas to life.Upcoming Products & UtilitiesDecentralized ExchangeAutomated Market MakerBridging Services & ExplorerIntegrated WalletsNFT-Market & SaaS Defi Marketplace Technology (Defi Shopify)LaunchpadTokenomicsName: InnovatorTicker: INOV8Algorithm: Nominated Proof of Stake (NPoS)Block time: 6 SecondsEpoch: 3 hoursERA: 6 hoursInflation: Ideal 10%Genesis Release Date: By End of November 2023Substrate: EVM: Full EVM Substrate /Solidity compatiblePremine: 20 Million INOV8Innovator Validator Licenses are currently available on https://innovatorchain.com27 Licenses have already been sold.. price goes up per license - currently 0.25e eachBlockchain Mainnet is launching by the end of November 2023.Links & Media Website: https://innovatorchain.com App: https://app.innovatorchain.com (under development) Testnet Explorer: https://devexplorer.innovatorchain.com/ Medium: https://medium.com/@innovatorchain Reddit: https://reddit.com/r/innovatorchain/ Whitepaper: https://innovatorchain.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/INNOVATOR-Whitepaper-V4.pdf Socials  Discord: https://discord.innovatorchain.com Telegram: https://t.me/Innovator_chain Twitter: https://twitter.com/INNOVATORCHAINN.B. I am not a team member of this project. I am just a thread designer only. If you need to know more about this project, please contact with them directly - marketing@innovatorchain.com

comments.author: ElySantoss
comments.body: It is an evolution of INN ( https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2291517) ?

comments.author: qqwx
comments.body: Quote from: ElySantoss on November 16, 2023, 06:18:57 PMIt is an evolution of INN ( https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2291517) ? Innovator isn't comparable. Much better concept, already developments of utilities being completed. And the actual blockchain will have custom pallets.

comments.author: elmo40
comments.body: You two are the same?https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5471719.0If not, too many projects with the same name.

comments.author: davidallen
comments.body: INNOVATOR's emphasis on being a secure gateway to blockchain technology is commendable. How does the platform ensure a secure and reliable environment for developers and companies entering the blockchain space? The focus on eco-friendly solutions and funding options for projects seems promising. How does INNOVATOR envision supporting sustainable blockchain-based applications while fostering innovation in the long run?

comments.author: GrandadofCrypto
comments.body: Quote from: davidallen on November 16, 2023, 08:23:42 PMHow does the platform ensure a secure and reliable environment for developers and companies entering the blockchain space?Innovator is built on the secure and decentralised Substrate framework, using the Nominated Proof of Stake (NPoS) algorithm, a model also employed by projects like Polkadot. Our team's experience ensures that security is a top priority, benefiting not just us, but also developers who choose to build on our chain.

comments.author: GrandadofCrypto
comments.body: Quote from: davidallen on November 16, 2023, 08:23:42 PMHow does INNOVATOR envision supporting sustainable blockchain-based applications while fostering innovation in the long run?Our mission is to assisting new projects in both Substrate and EVM technologies through our integrated launchpad what's being developed but of course other can build one. This launchpad gives our community a staking vote for the most promising teams and ideas for inclusion on our chain. Funding for these projects will be sourced from both private and public investments. At Innovator, we are committed to bring innovation at every turn and we plan to support this through the provision of grants and private and public raises.

comments.author: Blowon
comments.body: I want to ask why there is no token price applied?and I'm a little confused about the roadmap, I don't know when the mainnet will be launched.I think this information is really needed so that people can understand

comments.body: Quote from: Blowon on November 17, 2023, 08:26:22 PMI want to ask why there is no token price applied?and I'm a little confused about the roadmap, I don't know when the mainnet will be launched.I think this information is really needed so that people can understandBetter you can ask them on Discord or email- marketing@innovatorchain.com

comments.author: GrandadofCrypto
comments.body: Quote from: Blowon on November 17, 2023, 08:26:22 PMI want to ask why there is no token price applied?and I'm a little confused about the roadmap, I don't know when the mainnet will be launched.I think this information is really needed so that people can understandThe chain is due to go live on the 24th November, there is no price yet as the supply hasn't been minted yet.

comments.author: Blowon
comments.body: Quote from: GrandadofCrypto on November 18, 2023, 05:12:27 PMQuote from: Blowon on November 17, 2023, 08:26:22 PMI want to ask why there is no token price applied?and I'm a little confused about the roadmap, I don't know when the mainnet will be launched.I think this information is really needed so that people can understandThe chain is due to go live on the 24th November, there is no price yet as the supply hasn't been minted yet.Don't you have a plan regarding supply and the price benchmarks that you apply?Maybe you thought before launching it, I'll wait because it won't last long

comments.author: GrandadofCrypto
comments.body: Quote from: Blowon on November 18, 2023, 06:26:24 PMQuote from: GrandadofCrypto on November 18, 2023, 05:12:27 PMQuote from: Blowon on November 17, 2023, 08:26:22 PMI want to ask why there is no token price applied?and I'm a little confused about the roadmap, I don't know when the mainnet will be launched.I think this information is really needed so that people can understandThe chain is due to go live on the 24th November, there is no price yet as the supply hasn't been minted yet.Don't you have a plan regarding supply and the price benchmarks that you apply?Maybe you thought before launching it, I'll wait because it won't last longYes there is a plan and a price structure in the vesting rounds, we are launching the chain first and allowing validators to secure the network, we have already developed products and they're ready to go so early users will benefit.

comments.author: ovladmirs
comments.body: The project announcement thread in Russian - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5474699.0

comments.author: ovladmirs
comments.body: Good evening all,We're excited to share that our blockchain dashboard as started, this is designed to streamline and simplify transactions on the Innovator chain. A notable section being worked on is the wallet system, which now facilitates connections with Metamask on a substrate level giving you cheaper, faster and secure transactions; also the dashboard enables you to fully engage with the Innovator ecosystem that's been developed and soon to be released. Additionally, you'll find a feature in dashboard wallet section is an option that allows you to transfer funds over the bridge. This capability will soon enable you to send and receive funds from multiple blockchains directly to the Innovator chain wallet system keeping everything all in one place for ease of access to many blockchains.You are welcome to connect your Metamask and check it out for yourself. https://app.innovatorchain.com/walletIf you haven't added then chain into Metamask yet you can do so here by adding the details below.Network Name: Innovator ChainChain RPC: https://rpc.innovatorchain.com/Chain ID: 129Ticker: INOV8Explorer: https://evm.innovatorchain.com/Thanks Innovator team.
